characters.name: Breezette
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord card #65 F. Has a similar color scheme to Liza Doolots, 'Julia', and FIENDship is Magic 03 Unnamed Filly - Julia. Voiced by Cathy Weseluck. Wears a mushroom.

characters.name: Cloudia Breezie
characters.description: The first of three Breezies featured in mystery pack wave 11. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to collector card descriptions, she and all her friends love "to visit" Ponyville.

characters.name: Lilac Breezie
characters.description: The third of three Breezies featured in mystery pack wave 11. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to collector card descriptions, she and all her friends love "to visit" Ponyville.

characters.name: Random Breezie
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: Sea Breezie
characters.description: A Breezie featured in a Rainbow Power and Cutie Mark Magic pack with Fluttershy. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to various descriptions, she and Fluttershy are friends and "unlock the magic of friendship" together.

characters.name: Seabreeze
characters.description: See Seabreeze.

characters.name: Sunny Breezie
characters.description: The second of three Breezies featured in mystery pack wave 11. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to collector card descriptions, she and all her friends love "to visit" Ponyville.

characters.name: Sunset Breezie
characters.description: A Breezie featured in a Rainbow Power and Cutie Mark Magic pack with Princess Twilight Sparkle. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to various descriptions, she and Princess Twilight Sparkle are friends and "unlock the magic of friendship" together.

characters.name: Twirly
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, during The Magic of Friendship Grows in The Last Problem, on the season 4 poster, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord cards #65 F and #168 C. Has a similar color scheme to Lemony Gem, "Tennis Match", and "Brawly Beats". Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: Windfall
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Voiced by Andrea Libman.

characters.name: Applejack
characters.description: See Applejack.

characters.name: Fluttershy
characters.description: See Fluttershy.

characters.name: Pinkie Pie
characters.description: See Pinkie Pie.

characters.name: Rainbow Dash
characters.description: See Rainbow Dash.

characters.name: Rarity
characters.description: See Rarity.

characters.name: Twilight Sparkle

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, during The Magic of Friendship Grows in The Last Problem, on the season 4 poster, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord cards #138 R and #168 C. Shares its design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2 and has a similar color scheme to "Doseydotes", Prim Posy, and "Cotton Top".

characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, on the season 4 poster, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord card #65 F. Has a similar color scheme to Lyra Heartstrings.

characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during The Magic of Friendship Grows in The Last Problem, on the season 4 and Enterplay Tirek posters, on Enterplay trading card series 3 cards #E81 and #S8, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord cards #65 F and #168 C. Shares its color scheme with Twinkleshine and S05E21 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #2.

Has a similar color scheme to Apple Brown Betty, "Apple Crumble", Gaffer, and Goldie Delicious.

characters.name:
Seabreeze's wife
S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #11
characters.description: Seabreeze's wife, introduced in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #F2. Has a similar color scheme to S05E05 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5.

characters.name:
Seabreeze's baby
S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #12
characters.description: Seabreeze's newborn child, introduced in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #F2. Has a similar color scheme to Cottonbelle.

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Shares its design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2 and has a similar color scheme to "Thorn" and "Blueberry Banana".

characters.name:
Friendship Flutter
B3014 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: One of three Breezies featured in a Cutie Mark Magic pack of Friendship Flutters with Rarity. Shares its design with Breezie Pinkie Pie, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #2, and B3016 Unnamed Breezie #2, and has a similar color scheme to Lemon Hearts. According to packaging description, Rarity "has a fashion show for her fairy friends."

characters.name:
Friendship Flutter
B3014 Unnamed Breezie #2
characters.description: One of three Breezies featured in a Cutie Mark Magic pack of Friendship Flutters with Rarity. Shares its design with Seabreeze and B3015 Unnamed Breezie #1. According to packaging description, Rarity "has a fashion show for her fairy friends."

characters.name:
Friendship Flutter
B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3
characters.description: One of three Breezies featured in a Cutie Mark Magic pack of Friendship Flutters with Rarity. According to packaging description, Rarity "has a fashion show for her fairy friends."

characters.name:
Friendship Flutter
B3015 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: One of three Breezies featured in a Cutie Mark Magic pack of Friendship Flutters with Buttonbelle. Shares its design with Seabreeze and B3014 Unnamed Breezie #2. According to packaging description, Buttonbelle "shows her fairy friends how to sew."

Friendship Flutter

Shares its design with Breezie Pinkie Pie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #1, and B3016 Unnamed Breezie #2, and has a similar color scheme to Sugarcoat. According to packaging description, Buttonbelle "shows her fairy friends how to sew."

characters.name:
Friendship Flutter
B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: One of three Breezies featured in a Cutie Mark Magic pack of Friendship Flutters with Trixie Lulamoon. Shares its design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to packaging description, Trixie Lulamoon "shows her fairy friends magic tricks."

B3016 Unnamed Breezie #2
characters.description: One of three Breezies featured in a Cutie Mark Magic pack of Friendship Flutters with Trixie Lulamoon. Shares its design with Breezie Pinkie Pie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #1, and B3015 Unnamed Breezie #2. According to packaging description, Trixie Lulamoon "shows her fairy friends magic tricks."

Friendship Flutter
B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3

characters.name: Issue 35 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: A Breezie featured on Friendship is Magic Issue #35 Siege of the Crystal Empire part II page 1 with filly Radiant Hope, a parasprite, and some shadowy smoke. According to flashback narration, Radiant Hope "made friends with shadows and pixies and things no one else could see."

characters.name: Issue 41 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: A Breezie featured on Friendship is Magic Issue #41 Rainbow Dash and the Very Bad Day page 18. Has a similar color scheme to Daisy.

characters.name: Issue 61 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: A Breezie featured on Friendship is Magic Issue #61 cover A.

characters.name: Issue 61 Unnamed Breezie #2
characters.description: A Breezie featured on Friendship is Magic Issue #61 Convocation of the Creatures! page 5.

characters.name: Issue 61 Unnamed Breezie #3
characters.description: A Breezie featured on Friendship is Magic Issue #61 Convocation of the Creatures! page 18.

characters.name: Unknown Breezie #1
characters.description: One of at least two​[​specify​]​ Breezies featured on a big Polish floor sticker at a Carrefour shop in Poland. Shares its design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, and Unknown Breezie #2.

characters.description: One of at least two​[​specify​]​ Breezies featured on a big Polish floor sticker at a Carrefour shop in Poland. Shares its design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, and Unknown Breezie #1.
